home_description: This is a app to make teachers work more manageble.
home_login_first: If you want to use it, please login first!
unauth_header: You are not authorized to view the resource!
about_desc1: This app was originally developed by Fredrik Johansson, Växjö Kommun Kungsmadskolan, Sweden as a possible answer about how to work with digital education, from another perspective than just online text and online courseware.
about_desc2: This tool works best close coupled with Google classroom. It is inteded to add functionality, such as a reading test, glossary/word training via plugins.
about_lic_desc1: All the code for this app is released as open source and can be found on github.com/mumme74/trainee
about_lic_desc2: Licence for the sorce code of the backend (server) and the frontend (browser) code is Licenced under MIT permissive Licence.

delete_me_stage1_desc: All your saved work will be deleted
delete_me_stage2_header: Do you really want to Delete yourself from this system?

delete_me_stage3_header: A Request to delete you have been sent to the server!
delete_me_stage3_desc2: You can't say I didn't warn you.
signup_header: Sign up as a new user
signup_desc1: If you join through login information below you can't access content from people in your domain.
signup_desc2: Most likely you want to join through Google OAuth account on the above button instead.
student_access_profile_google_managed: Your profile is managed at Google!
